Package appDomain

Class XMLParser

java.lang.Object
appDomain.XMLParser
public class XMLParser extends Object
XML Parser that validates XML documents for proper syntax and structure

  • Method Details

    • parseXML

      public void parseXML(String filePath)
      Parses an XML file and validates its syntax
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the XML file to be parsed
      Throws:
      EmptyQueueException - if queue operations fail
      IOException - if file reading fails

    • extractTagName

      private String extractTagName(String tag)
      Extracts the tag name from an XML tag
      Parameters:
      tag - the XML tag string to process (e.g. "<tag>" or "</tag>")
      Returns:
      the tag name without brackets and attributes, or null if invalid format

    • logError

      private void logError(String message, int lineNum)
      Logs an error message with line number to the error queue
      Parameters:
      message - the error message to log
      lineNum - the line number where the error occurred

    • printErrors

      private void printErrors() throws EmptyQueueException
      Prints all accumulated errors from the error queue If no errors are found, prints a success message
      Throws:
      EmptyQueueException - if trying to dequeue from an empty queue

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
